TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdCreatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在页面上显示广告时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它获取在创建控件时与播发关联的 URL 并将其显示在控件下。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 此示例需要在下面的示例中列出的 XML 文件 (Ads)。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息, 请参阅 类的属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

param.name: adProperties
param.span: 包含 XML 文件中公布属性的 。

span.span: A containing the advertisement properties from the XML file.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`adProperties` 如果参数不为`null`, 则为参数的值; 否则为空。 `adProperties`The value of the `adProperties` parameter if the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`; otherwise, an empty .| ||如果参数不`null` 为`adProperties` , 则为表示替换文本的参数中的值; 否则为。 `adProperties`If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the alternate text; otherwise, .| ||如果参数不`null` 为`adProperties` , 则为参数中的值, 该值表示要显示的图像的 URL; 否则为。 `adProperties`If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL of the image to display; otherwise, .| ||如果参数不`null` 为`adProperties` , 则为表示要导航到的 URL 的参数中的值; 否则为。 `adProperties`If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL to navigate to; otherwise, .|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdProperties As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ AdProperties { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含当前显示公布的所有公布属性。

span.span: Gets a object that contains all the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

value.span: ，它包含当前显示的广告的广告属性列表。

span.span: A that contains a list of advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可获取一个对象, 该对象包含当前显示的广告的播发属性。 Use the property to get a object that contains the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement. 对象的键和值的类型为。The keys and values of the object are of type . 每次控件在网页上显示时, 控件都随机选择广告。The control randomly selects an advertisement each time the control is displayed on the Web page. 所选播发的属性将从播发 XML 文件中提取并存储在对象中。The attributes for the selected advertisement are extracted from the advertisement XML file and stored in a object. 当控件创建类的新实例时, 将使用对象初始化属性。 When the control creates a new instance of the class, the property gets initialized with the object. 有关播发的自定义属性 (如广告标题) 也可以包含在广告 XML 文件中。Custom attributes about an advertisement, such as an advertisement caption, can also be included in the advertisement XML file. 在事件处理程序中使用此属性可获取自定义属性。Use this property in the event handler to get the custom attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件处理程序中的属性提供自定义标题。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event handler to provide a custom caption. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/Common/Ads.xml#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在广告 XML 文件中包含有关播发的自定义属性。The following code example demonstrates how to include custom attributes about an advertisement in the advertisement XML file. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息, 请参阅 类的属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlternateText : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置当公布图像不可用时显示在 控件中的替换文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the advertisement image is unavailable.

summary.span: 支持工具提示功能的浏览器将此文本显示为公布的工具提示。

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip for the advertisement.

value.span: 公布图像不可用时，代替该图像显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the advertisement image if the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在属性中指定的图像不可用时要显示的文本。 Use the property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中, 此文本还显示为广告的工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the advertisement. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示的播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件自动设置属性, 该属性具有 XML 文件中的相应替代文本项。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding alternate text entry in the XML file. 此属性还可用于以编程方式设置替换文字。This property can also be used to programmatically set the alternate text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/CS/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/VB/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息, 请参阅 类的属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为控件中的广告显示的图像的 URL。 Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display for an advertisement in the control. 您可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 将图像的位置与网页或用户控件的位置相关联, 而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中, 而无需在代码中更新图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 绝对 URL 提供完整路径, 因此, 将站点移到另一个目录需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示的播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件自动设置属性, 该属性具有包含公布信息的 XML 文件中的相应图像 URL 条目。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding image URL entry in the XML file containing the advertisement information. 此属性还可用于以编程方式设置图像 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the image URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用广告文件并为此属性指定一个相对 URL, 则该 URL 相对于广告文件所在的目录。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果你使用相对 URL 直接设置此属性, 而不是使用广告文件, 则该 URL 相对于包含控件的页面或用户控件的目录。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息, 请参阅 类的属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NavigateUrl : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在单击 控件时要显示的网页。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web page to display when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时要显示的网页。

span.span: The Web page to display when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击控件时要显示的网页。Use the property to specify the Web page to display when the control is clicked. 此属性的一个常见用途是将导航器重定向到单击控件时, 将该导航器重定向到一个页面, 该页面可以计算用户在进入目标 URL 之前单击广告的次数。A common use for this property is to redirect the navigation, when the control is clicked, to a page that can count the number of times the user clicked the advertisement before proceeding to the destination URL. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示的播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件自动设置属性, 该属性具有 XML 文件中的相应导航 URL 条目。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding navigation URL entry in the XML file. 此属性还可用于以编程方式设置导航 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the navigation URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用广告文件并为此属性指定一个相对 URL, 则该 URL 相对于广告文件所在的目录。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果你使用相对 URL 直接设置此属性, 而不是使用广告文件, 则该 URL 相对于包含控件的页面或用户控件的目录。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息, 请参阅 类的属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```
